xyz.fsgek.common.io

Interface GekFileCache


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface GekFileCache
    File cache service, provides cached IO methods.
    See Also:
    GekFileCache.Builder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GekFileCache.Builder
      Builder for GekFileCache.
      static interface  GekFileCache.CacheReadListener
      Listener for cache read.
      static interface  GekFileCache.CacheWriteListener
      Listener for cache write.
      static class  GekFileCache.Chunk
      Value for chunk cache, holds file chunk data and tail flag.
      static interface  GekFileCache.ChunkCache
      Cache interface used for GekFileCache, must support remove listener.
      static interface  GekFileCache.ChunkCacheGenerator
      Generator for file chunk cache.
      static class  GekFileCache.ChunkIndex
      Key for chunk cache, holds file path and index of cached chunk data.
      static interface  GekFileCache.FileAccessGenerator
      Generator for un-cached underlying file access.
      static interface  GekFileCache.FileReadListener
      Listener for underlying file read.
      static interface  GekFileCache.FileWriteListener
      Listener for underlying file write.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int cachedChunkCount()
      Returns cached file chunk count.
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream(java.nio.file.Path path, long offset)
      Opens an input stream for file of given path at specified file position, data of the stream comes from cache or underlying file (if cache not found or expired).
      java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream(java.nio.file.Path path, long offset)
      Opens an output stream for file of given path at specified file position, and cache will be updated after writing.
      static GekFileCache.Builder newBuilder()
      Returns a new builder for GekFileCache.
      void setFileLength(java.nio.file.Path path, long newLength)
      Sets new file length for given path, truncated or extended.
